statements: SELECT title, author FROM articles;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE topic = 'Technology';
SELECT author, publish_date FROM articles WHERE author='John Doe';
SELECT content FROM articles WHERE publish_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT article_id, title, topic FROM articles ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE author = 'John Doe'
SELECT title, content FROM articles WHERE publish_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT article_id, topic FROM articles WHERE author = 'Jane Smith' ORDER BY publish_date DESC
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE topic = 'Technology' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5
SELECT author, COUNT(article_id) AS total_articles FROM articles GROUP BY author HAVING total_articles > 3
SELECT article_title, article_text FROM articles;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT article_title, article_text FROM articles WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT topic_id, topic_name FROM topic_modeling;
SELECT * FROM topic_modeling WHERE topic_id = 3;
SELECT article_id, article_title FROM articles WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM articles ORDER BY article_title DESC;
SELECT article_title, article_text FROM articles WHERE article_id > 5 AND article_id < 10;
SELECT article_id, article_title, topic_name FROM articles JOIN topic_modeling ON articles.article_id = topic_modeling.article_id;
SELECT topic_name, COUNT(*) FROM topic_modeling GROUP BY topic_name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT article_title, article_content FROM articles WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT author_name, author_email FROM authors ORDER BY author_name ASC;
SELECT topic_name FROM topics WHERE topic_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY topic_id DESC;
SELECT article_title, article_content FROM articles WHERE article_id > 3 ORDER BY article_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE article_id = 1
SELECT article_title, article_content FROM articles WHERE article_id IN (2, 3)
SELECT author_name, author_email FROM authors ORDER BY author_name DESC
SELECT topic_name FROM topics WHERE topic_id = 3

SELECT article_title, article_content, author_name, author_email, topic_name FROM articles AS a INNER JOIN authors AS au ON a.article_id = au.author_id INNER JOIN topics AS t ON a.article_id = t.topic_id
SELECT * FROM articles
SELECT title, content FROM articles
SELECT author_name FROM authors
SELECT topic_name FROM topics
SELECT article_id, title FROM articles
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT title, content FROM articles ORDER BY article_id DESC;
SELECT articles.article_id, articles.title, authors.author_name FROM articles JOIN authors ON articles.article_id = authors.author_id;

SELECT articles.article_id, articles.title, topics.topic_name FROM articles JOIN article_topics ON articles.article_id = article_topics.article_id JOIN topics ON article_topics.topic_id = topics.topic_id;

SELECT articles.title, COUNT(article_topics.topic_id) AS topic_count FROM articles LEFT JOIN article_topics ON articles.article_id = article_topics.article_id GROUP BY articles.title HAVING COUNT(article_topics.topic_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT title, content FROM articles;
SELECT author_name FROM authors;
SELECT article_id, author_id FROM article_authors;
SELECT category_name FROM categories;
SELECT title, content FROM articles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM authors WHERE author_id > 100 ORDER BY author_name DESC;

SELECT title, author_name, category_name FROM articles JOIN article_authors ON articles.id = article_authors.article_id JOIN authors ON article_authors.author_id = authors.author_id JOIN article_categories ON articles.id = article_categories.article_id JOIN categories ON article_categories.category_id = categories.category_id WHERE category_name = 'Technology' ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT author_name FROM authors WHERE author_name LIKE 'J%';

SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS num_articles FROM categories JOIN article_categories ON categories.category_id = article_categories.category_id GROUP BY category_name HAVING num_articles > 5 ORDER BY num_articles DESC;
